abstract: With no school, some young students descended upon Zuccotti Park, chanting "Occupy Wall Street is the Place to Be" and holding charmingly misspelled signs.
snippet: With no school, some young students descended upon Zuccotti Park, chanting "Occupy Wall Street is the Place to Be" and holding charmingly misspelled signs.

headline.main: Children Spend a Day at Protesters' Encampment
